sections.name: BATTLE TITAN FORMATIONS / / Army must contain at least one Chaos Emperor Titan or Chaos Warlord Titan / / May not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations
SCOUT TITAN FORMATIONS / / Three for each Chaos Emperor Titan formation, two for each Chaos Warlord Titan. May not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations
DAEMON ENGINES / / Three for each Battle Titan Formation, or one for each unit in a Scout Titan Formation. May not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations
CHAOS UNDIVIDED ALLIES and CHAOS NAVY / / Max 33% of the army

formations.name: CHAOS SQUATS of Chaos Undivided
